channel.title: CVE Feed for blossomthemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for blossomthemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-37338|2024-08-03T10:29:20.718Z -- blossomthemes -- blossom%20recipe%20maker%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Authenticated (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Blossom Recipe Maker plugin <= 1.0.7 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-2107|2024-08-01T19:03:38.847Z -- blossomthemes -- blossom%20spa
item.description: The Blossom Spa theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.4 via generated source. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including contents of password-protected or scheduled posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-2107|2024-06-04T17:30:12.584Z -- blossomthemes -- blossom%20spa
item.description: The Blossom Spa theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.4 via generated source. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including contents of password-protected or scheduled posts.
